mapper.select: SELECT code_no, code_nm, code_id, code_content, code_isactive FROM code

SELECT code_no,code_nm,code_id,code_content,code_isactive FROM code WHERE (code_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%'))AND code_isactive=1) OR (code_id LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')) AND code_isactive=1)
